name: while (true) (Revolution Game, Revolution Game)
description:
Created for Untitled Game Jam #73.
There's no key to reverse any inputted instruction, so press R to restart.

Defence instructions have a cooldown of 1 instruction. That means if you place 2 consecutive defence instruction the second one will be neglected.

Attack only attacking 1 random enemy when there are multiple nearest enemy.

You will notice a bar filling up at the bottom. When it reaches the right side, you increase 1 health.

Please note the fact that you cannot only place attack.

Good Luck!
